project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API.

task.name: Research and select a suitable public API for fetching weather information
Implement the function to fetch weather data from the selected API
Parse the fetched data to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement the display function to show the weather information in the terminal
Write tests for each of the implemented functions above
Execute tests to ensure all implemented functions work correctly
